text: Minggang railway station () is a station on Beijing–Guangzhou railway in Minggang, Pingqiao District, Xinyang, Henan. ==History== The station was established in 1903. There is no regular scheduled passenger trains stop at this station after 2014, although ticket services remain at the station. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Beijing–Guangzhou Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1903
title: Minggang railway station
